dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset created by the authors using rendering techniques to generate images with and without object shadows, aimed at improving shadow generation for composite images.
dcterms:title: RdSOBA

dcterms:creator: Y. Hong
L. Niu
J. Zhang
dcterms:description: The first synthetic dataset for real-world scenes, consisting of tuples of composite images, foreground object masks, and background object-shadow pairs, aimed at addressing shadow inconsistency in composite images.
dcterms:title: DESOBA
